text: Andrei Vladimirovich Chuprina (; born 24 September 1976 in Krasnodar) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Sportspeople from Krasnodar Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Angusht Nazran players Category:Association football defenders
title: Andrei Chuprina
